CustomField.description: The ZIP or Postal Code(s) to evaluate, separated by semi-colons. If multiple codes are specified, the logic will find a match if the evaluated record is in any of the supplied postal codes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The ZIP or Postal Code(s) to evaluate, separated by semi-colons. If multiple codes are specified, the logic will find a match if the evaluated record is in any of the supplied postal codes.
CustomField.label: Postal Code
